summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Monik Reffatti Nails luxury manicure website. All core functionality working perfectly including navigation, animations, form submissions, and backend API integration.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (100% success rate - 8/8 tests passed)
Frontend page navigation (Home, Services, Blog, Contact, About)
Hero section with Framer Motion animations
Service gallery with hover effects (4 service cards)
Services page data loading with fallback
Blog page data loading with fallback
Contact form submission with backend integration
Dark theme with champagne gold accents (#1a1a1a + #E5D3B3)
Google Maps integration on contact page
